thread.section_title: Andaz Wall Street - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect for a weekend stay! Cheap & accessible
thread.title_full: Perfect for a weekend stay! Cheap & accessible - Review of Andaz Wall Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Asim M
title: Perfect for a weekend stay! Cheap & accessible
text: Stayed here with a couple Friends in mid February...The hotel itself is pretty close to the wall st. Metro station about 2 blocks...so you can easily access Manhattan or brooklyn...the room was big for manhattan...i stayed in the andaz suite...it was a pretty spacious corner room...with a decent view of the wall street area...weird thing, and its starting to become a trend at hyatts...is the shower has a glass see through door...not good if you're staying with friends...aside from that the room was awesome! nice amenities and free minibar goodies...as diamond/globalist you get breakfast in the restaurant, which was nothing special but the service was great...all in all this is a great hotel for the weekend especially with the lower weekend rates!!
